query: SELECT 'SENT' as type, DATE_FORMAT(sentAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as timestamp, messageType, recipient FROM reminderLogs WHERE recipient = '+447950586880' UNION ALL SELECT 'RECEIVED' as type, DATE_FORMAT(receivedAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as timestamp, LEFT(messageBody, 40) as messageType, fromNumber as recipient FROM customerMessages WHERE fromNumber = '+447950586880' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
